descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?
[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This is a weird looking shiv retexture.
[/size][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with manager or you know what to do.[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][center][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color][/center][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]What does the .esp do?[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] It adds shiv to dragonsreach, on meeting table.[/size]

[size=5]Q:[/size][size=3] Why did this effect my lockpick's grip?[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] Lockpick's girp uses shiv's grip.[/size]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][img]http://i.imgur.com/iA5jYST.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DfM7BGC.jpg[/img]
[/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
